I'd read some fantastic things about this place.  Unfortunately, the service was so bad that I almost couldn't wait to finish and leave.  The girl who served me seemed to be going out of her way to be unfriendly - not just with me, but with all the tables I saw her serve.  Whenever she engaged with her colleagues she was laughing and happy and would then approach a table, unsmiling and surly. Food was just plopped on the table, no eye contact, interaction or invitation to enjoy the meal.  The food itself was pretty unadventurous.  I had the set menu with a rather pedestrian salad to start and then a main course of lentils, lightly curried, with some potatoes.  It was good, but hardly earth-shattering.   However, bad service will always take the edge off a good meal for me. I imagine that the set menu is less elaborate than the evening menu, and I would happily return to try some other dishes, were it not for receiving the worst service I have encountered all year.
